title: Virtual Assistant (Media, Tech & Social Media Focused)
job_overview:
Job Description:
We are looking for a dynamic and highly organized Virtual Assistant with a passion for media, technology, and social media. This role requires a tech-savvy, detail-oriented individual who can support our operations across content creation, social media management, and administrative tasks. If you have experience in media, digital marketing, or tech, and love staying up to date with industry trends, this is the perfect role for you.


Must work on Los Angeles timezone.

Key Responsibilities:
Various tasks to Assist CEO
Social Media posting and using templates


Administrative Support – Manage calendars, emails, and coordinate meetings
Project Management – Assist in organizing and tracking tasks across multiple projects using tools like Trello, Asana, or ClickUp
Basic Graphic & Video Editing – (Bonus) Experience with Canva, CapCut, Adobe Suite, or other content creation tools
Customer Engagement – Respond to inquiries and engage with followers or customers via email and social media
Light Data Analysis – Monitor and report on social media performance, engagement, and campaign results
Qualifications:
At least 1-2 years of experience as a Virtual Assistant, Social Media Manager, or in a media/tech-related role
Strong understanding of social media platforms, content creation, and digital trends
Excellent written and verbal English communication skills
Tech-savvy and proficient in Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Calendar), Microsoft Office
Experience with social media tools like Buffer, Later, Hootsuite, or Meta Business Suite is a plus
Basic knowledge of AI tools, digital marketing, or influencer marketing is a big advantage
Familiarity with video editing, graphic design, or podcast editing is a bonus
Strong organizational and time-management skills
Reliable internet connection and a quiet work environment

What We Offer:
Opportunity to work with a fast-growing tech and media company
Flexible work hours and a remote work setup
Growth opportunities with training and mentorship
If you're passionate about media, technology, and social media, and want to work in a dynamic digital environment, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now by sending your resume and a brief introduction.
